title: The Perfection That Is You
features: Look into the mirror and see The Perfection That is You!
"The head may not remember, but the feet never forget".

With this sentence, Tal Israel, a reflexologist and spiritual coach, began her research towards writing this book. After many hours of professional treatment encompassing several years, and much in-depth work, she has put together a practical guide to life and self-healing - "The Perfection That is You".

The book is for those who wish to make a change, those who want to understand the causes of hardship in their lives, for those who want to take control of their own fate and for those who long to part with pain and lack of fulfillment and happiness.

Readers will be able to embark on a journey of self-identification, followed by a release from pain and trauma in a fascinating, friendly manner. This process happens by using our distinct life map, understanding the rules that control our lives, learning the principle of the cycles in our lives, self-treating with reflexology, and opening a new toolbox for a richer life.
opens a gateway to an amazing journey.
Now, all that remains is to begin walking down this exciting path of empowerment.
description: "I enjoyed reading the book and even summed up some things from it. Phrases of empowerment on different subjects will remain useful in my daily life." -
"I enjoyed the book. Every word is right on target, without any superfluous words. Warmly recommended." -
"Mandatory reading for everyone, perfect, I am a witness and I confess that Tal delivers on all her promises. -
"I love the book, a capsule of deep healing and self approval. I thank the talented writer and wise spiritual teacher." -

"The book lies next to me on the night table. Even though I have finished reading it, I enjoy its soothing,enlightening presence, the wise voice of the author is so important, we are all thirsty for what she chose to share in the book. Highly recommended."  -

My main objective in publishing this book is to help as many people as possible become stronger and happier--which will make the world a better place. This book teaches us to identify the causes of the difficulties we experience, let go of them, and create the lives we want for ourselves. You will be able to build yourselves a rich

that will help bring you to a position of happiness and lightness--I invite you to come on a thrilling voyage towards your own selves and realize you can do differently. Everyone can!People who have read the book tell me of intense processes they went through - how the book enabled them to recognize the power they had inside them to confront life, and change what didn't serve them well and only weighed them down.Today, they know that everything is possible!My goal was achieved and I continue to strive for more!

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/B1VHCKxFRoS._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'Tal Israel', 'about': ["After 13 years as a kindergarten teacher, Tal Israel left the public education system in order to become a doula. The addition of reflexology as a sub-specialty was Tal's initial exposure to methods of treatment which go beyond the physical.", 'After several years as an active doula, Tal felt she had the need – and the ability – to use reflexology in order to dig deeper and solve problems at the source. Tal specialized in fertility issues – treating them with reflexology (either as independent treatments, or in conjunction with more formal medical ones).', 'Through her work, Tal learned to identify the causes of medical conditions, which were rooted not in the physical space, but rather in the spiritual one. While treating her patients, she identified patterns of events in our lives, how they affect our happiness, our physical and mental health. Eventually, she has found how, by relating to these events, we can influence them all positively.', 'Tal now practices reflexology and coaching in Pardes Hanna, Israel, treating people from all over the country.']}
